title: New Oceanic Community - Eternum
body:
**Eternum**
http://www.eternum.org


**What is Eternum?**

Eternum is an aspiration forged on the dreams of two friends. We play many different games and realized that more often than not, we don't have enough people to do what we want to. So we thought, "There MUST be people out there with the same problems as us". From this, Eternum was born. We aim to be an international community for gamers. Our goal is to allow like-minded individuals to enjoy their games with good company.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**What we offer to you**

**Multi-Platform Gaming.**
We are mainly a League of Legends community, but we support a varying amount of games, such as MMORPGs, FPS, RTS, even Card games. We have a variety of members that play all sorts of games, on all sorts of platforms. 

**Tournaments.**
Once we get a steady amount of active members, we will be hosting 1v1 Tournaments, through to 3v3 and 5v5s.

**Teamspeak.**
Teamspeak is the heart of the community, while all the members are the backbone. 
It is our main form of communication. 
We have channels that are dedicated to 'chilling out', where you can relax and talk to friends about your day and we also have rooms that are designed for ranked games as well, so people are respectful when it comes to privacy.

**Safe Environment.**
We offer a safe environment, we DO NOT tolerate trolls or any form of misbehaving and causing your team grief.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**STEPS TO JOIN**
1. Fill out an application at http://www.eternum.org/recruitment
2. Hop on Teamspeak - ts74.gameservers.com:9361
3. Join the Recruitment channel on Teamspeak.
4. A staff member will be with you in 1-5 minutes to talk with you and welcome you to the community.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**CONTACTS**

**Founder**
_Huggeyface_

**Administrators**
_Haitheyface_


If you have any questions/concerns about our community, feel free to add these players to your friends list in-game.

replies.body: So exactly how is this community better then any others?

I don't believe in saying that one community is 'better' than another. I believe that different communities offer different things. The answer to your question is really what you want out of a community. This post has dictated what we offer, now it's up to you if you want to give us a go.
